news.title: Adolescence star Owen Cooper becomes youngest-ever best supporting actor in a limited series winner at Emmys 2025
news.summary: 14 at the time of filming. Cooper had never landed a professional role before the series.

news.title: Myles O’Reilly on Against All Certainty: “Until I actually sat in front of the President, I didn’t think it was going to happen. I thought it was all a dream..."
news.summary: Myles O’Reilly on why he was the right person to provide the musical backdrop to the voice of Michael D. Higgins, visiting the Áras, and how a near-death experience contributed to his love of ambient sounds.

news.title: Tarach Ó Snodaigh on Palestine: "You could see how the occupation is strangling communities"
news.summary: A member of the band Grooveline, Tarach Ó Snodaigh recently spent two weeks in the Aida refugee camp in the occupied West Bank. He reflects on an experience that offered a sometimes harrowing insight into the plight of the Palestinian people – but also provided evidence of their incredible spirit and resilience.

news.title: The Rest Is History podcast announces live shows in Belfast, Dublin and Cork
news.summary: The award-winning podcast will go on the road with a special deep dive on The Titanic.

news.title: Lewis Capaldi announces Limerick, Dublin and Belfast outdoor summer gigs
news.summary: He will play Marlay Park, Thomond Park and Belfast Vital across June and August 2026.
